2022631.itemDesc: As you are surrounded by the fragrant scent of Roses, you get a strange headache and your feet start to feel heavy. Go see Lana before the scent disappears.

2022632.itemDesc: As you are surrounded by the refreshing scent of Freesias, you get a strange headache and your feet start to feel heavy. Go see Lana before the scent disappears.

2022633.itemDesc: As you are surrounded by the sweet scent of Lavenders, you get a strange headache and your feet start to feel heavy. Go see Lana before the scent disappears.

2022634.itemDesc: A huge roasted turkey leg. It's so big that it seems like it would take all day to finish eating.\n[Gives +30 Physical Attack for 3 minutes]

2022635.itemDesc: The mysterious striped candy cane glows with a magical light. When consumed, it gives: +35 W.Att, +10 Jump for 20 minutes.

2022636.itemDesc: This sugary treat emanates a dim light.\r\nWhen consumed, it gives: +45 M.Att, +10 Speed for 20 minutes.

2022701.itemDesc: #cAn item for Ad Balloon Hunts#\r\nIncreases the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of you and your party members for 15 sec.

2022702.itemDesc: #cAn item for Ad Balloon Hunts#\r\nDecreases the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of the opposing party members for 15 sec.

2022703.itemDesc: #cAn item for Ad Balloon Hunts#\r\nInstalls and activates a Time Bomb in the hunting field. Affected opponents will be stunned for 3 sec.

2023137.itemDesc: This spicy, sweet Ginger Man Cookie was made with Earl Grey tea. \nRecovers about 3,000 HP.

2023139.itemDesc: A rare, powerful potion brewed according to ancient recipes. When consumed, gives +40 Speed, +20 Jump for 10 minutes.

2023142.itemDesc: A chocolate popsicle... a chocsicle? Gives +40 Weapon Attack for 5 minutes.

2023146.itemDesc: A freaky icecream cone that looks like a slime. Recovers 7000 MP.
